ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can refried beans, 1 pound ground beef, 1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 4 (6 inch) corn tortillas, 8 ounces shredded Cheddar cheese, 8 tablespoons sour cream, 2  roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped, 2  green onion, chopped, 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chiles, drained,   +   1/2  avocado, diced, 1 tablespoon black olives, sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 48g 62%, Saturated Fat 23g 114%, Cholesterol 150mg 50%, Sodium 1542mg 67%, Total Carbohydrate 42g 15%, Dietary Fiber 10g 37%, Total Sugars 4g, Protein 42g, Vitamin C 24mg 122%, Calcium 534mg 41%, Iron 5mg 29%, Potassium 866mg 18%
